## SimpleProduct.updated\_at property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> The field should not be used on the storefront.
> 

Timestamp indicating when the product was updated.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
updated_at?: Maybe<Scalars['String']>;
```
